data.text:
Condition: Acceptable. Please see the images for more details.

Rocking a 3.91, 2,234 ratings on Goodreads

For fans of : “Apocalyptic/Post-Apocalyptic, Colonization, Dying Earth

Publisher Blurb: “A runaway planet hurtles toward the earth. As it draws near, massive tidal waves, earthquakes, and volcanic eruptions wrack our planet, devastating continents, drowning cities, and wiping out millions. In central North America, a team of scientists race to build a spacecraft powerful enough to escape the doomed earth. Their greatest threat, they soon discover, comes not from the skies but from other humans.”

Fun Fact: “The 1951 film adaptation of the book starring Richard Derr altered the story in several aspects and gave the spaceship a complete redesign.”
